products.name: old snow globe
products.description: immortalize your loved ones in this picture snow globe. whose kids are those? i have no idea, i could never figure out how to open this stupid thing.

products.name: worst headphones ever
products.description: prank your friends in need with these awful, awful headphones. i mean seriously, how do you make headphones that sound worse than am radio? they're soooo bad. please, just take them.

products.name: canon t3i
products.description: somewhat old, but it takes better portraits than an iphone. (portrait lens not included)

products.name: friends t-shirt
products.description: could this BE any more of a shirt?

products.name: used socks
products.description: i used them for keeping my feet warm. that's it.

products.name: yellow beanie
products.description: don't be a meanie and just get this beanie. if you don't buy it, i'll hit you with zucchini.

products.name: full-frame star wars dvds
products.description: bust out your old crt for these movies that'll make you say 'wow i can't believe i paid money for these.'

products.name: some bollywood movie

products.name: succulent

products.name: beheaded basil plant

products.name: korg grand piano
